text.div:
This code system http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/process-meta-primary-or-secondary defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
PRIMARY PrimaryPrimary data originates from the source system or the data integrator.
SECONDARY SecondarySecondary data is transalated or derived data produced by a data processor that aggregates, interprets, derives or in some other way processes and enhances the source data.

name: PrimaryOrSecondary
title: Primary or Secondary
description: Identifies the origin of the data elements from primary or secondary systems

concept.definition: Primary data originates from the source system or the data integrator.
Secondary data is transalated or derived data produced by a data processor that aggregates, interprets, derives or in some other way processes and enhances the source data.
